You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: There are four shapes in the image. One is a purple plus sign, one is a pink letter P, one is a pink letter T, and one is a shape made of two orange shapes. The orange shape is a backwards L on top of a rectangle. The orange shape is on the left side of the image. The purple plus sign is in the middle of the image. The pink letter P is on the right side of the image. The pink letter T is below the pink letter P. There is also a green shape on the right side of the image. The green shape is made of three rectangles. The top rectangle is horizontal, the middle rectangle is vertical, and the bottom rectangle is horizontal. The middle rectangle is on the left side of the top rectangle. The bottom rectangle is on the right side of the middle rectangle.
continue
